nodes.text: Director of Sienar Marketing Relations was an employment title at Sienar Fleet Systems, a major starship manufacturer. It was held by Taed Augustus during the unveiling of the TIE Advanced x1 to Dark Lord of the Sith Darth Vader in the time of the Galactic Empire.

Director of Sienar Marketing Relations was first mentioned in the "TIE Advanced" entry in the in-game databank of the PlayStation 3 and Xbox 360 versions of the 2010 LucasArts video game Star Wars: The Force Unleashed II.
